name: Séga
description: Mascarene Islands and Seychelles genre featuring a distinctive 6/8 rhythm.

children.name: Seggae
children.description: Fusion of Séga and Reggae, popular on Mauritius and other Mascarene Islands.

children.name: Traditional Séga
children.description: Séga dance music born in the 18th century, before its later adoption of Western pop elements.
